query: SELECT uu.id, uu.user_id, u.name as user_name, u.email, uu.unternehmen_id, un.name as firma, uu.rolle FROM user_unternehmen uu JOIN users u ON uu.user_id = u.id JOIN unternehmen un ON uu.unternehmen_id = un.id;
